vulnerability_description: Atlassian Jira is vulnerable to an unauthorized server side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability that affects the endpoint /plugins/servlet/gadgets/makeRequest. An unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted web request to a vulnerable Jira server. Successful exploitation would result in unauthorized access to view and potentially modify internal network resources.
vulnerability_remediation: To fix this vulnerability upgrade to the latest version of Atlassian Jira. This vulnerability was fixed in Jira versions 8.4.0, 7.13.9.
impact: An unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted web request to a vulnerable Jira server. Successful exploitation would result in unauthorized access to view and potentially modify internal network resources.
